speaker: FALSTAFF
text: Bardolph, I say!

speaker: BARDOLPH
text: Here, sir.

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: Go fetch me a quart of sack; put a toast in ’t.

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: Have I lived to be carried in a basket like a barrow

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: of butcher’s offal, and to be thrown in the Thames?

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: Well, if I be served such another trick, I’ll have my

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: brains ta’en out and buttered, and give them to a

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: dog for a New Year’s gift. ’Sblood, the rogues

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: slighted me into the river with as little remorse as

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: they would have drowned a blind bitch’s puppies,

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: fifteen i’ th’ litter! And you may know by my size

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: that I have a kind of alacrity in sinking; if the bottom

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: were as deep as hell, I should down. I had

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: been drowned, but that the shore was shelvy and

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: shallow—a death that I abhor, for the water swells

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: a man, and what a thing should I have been when

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: I had been swelled! By the Lord, I should have

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: been a mountain of mummy.

speaker: BARDOLPH
text: Here’s Mistress Quickly, sir, to speak with

speaker: BARDOLPH
text: you.

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: Come, let me pour in some sack to the

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: Thames water, for my belly’s as cold as if I had

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: swallowed snowballs for pills to cool the reins.

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: Call her in.

speaker: BARDOLPH
text: Come in, woman.

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              QUICKLY
text: By your leave, I cry you mercy. Give

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              QUICKLY
text: your Worship good morrow.

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: Take away these chalices. Go

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: brew me a pottle of sack finely.

speaker: BARDOLPH
text: With eggs, sir?

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: Simple of itself. I’ll no pullet sperm in my

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: brewage.

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: How now?

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              QUICKLY
text: Marry, sir, I come to your Worship

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              QUICKLY
text: from Mistress Ford.

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: Mistress Ford? I have had ford enough. I

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: was thrown into the ford, I have my belly full of

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: ford.

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              QUICKLY
text: Alas the day, good heart, that was

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              QUICKLY
text: not her fault. She does so take on with her men;

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              QUICKLY
text: they mistook their erection.

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: So did I mine, to build upon a foolish

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: woman’s promise.

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              QUICKLY
text: Well, she laments, sir, for it, that it

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              QUICKLY
text: would yearn your heart to see it. Her husband goes

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              QUICKLY
text: this morning a-birding; she desires you once more

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              QUICKLY
text: to come to her, between eight and nine. I must

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              QUICKLY
text: carry her word quickly. She’ll make you amends, I

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              QUICKLY
text: warrant you.

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: Well, I will visit her. Tell her so. And bid her

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: think what a man is. Let her consider his frailty,

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: and then judge of my merit.

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              QUICKLY
text: I will tell her.

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: Do so. Between nine and ten, say’st thou?

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              QUICKLY
text: Eight and nine, sir.

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: Well, be gone. I will not miss her.

speaker:
MISTRESS
               
              QUICKLY
text: Peace be with you, sir.

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: I marvel I hear not of Master Brook. He

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: sent me word to stay within. I like his money well.

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: O, here he comes.

speaker: FORD
text: God bless you, sir.

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: Now, Master Brook, you come to know

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: what hath passed between me and Ford’s wife.

speaker: FORD
text: That indeed, Sir John, is my

speaker: FORD
text: business.

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: Master Brook, I will not lie to you. I was at

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: her house the hour she appointed me.

speaker: FORD
text: And sped you, sir?

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: Very ill-favoredly, Master Brook.

speaker: FORD
text: How so, sir? Did she change her

speaker: FORD
text: determination?

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: No, Master Brook, but the peaking cornuto

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: her husband, Master Brook, dwelling in a continual

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: ’larum of jealousy, comes me in the instant of

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: our encounter, after we had embraced, kissed,

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: protested, and, as it were, spoke the prologue of

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: our comedy, and, at his heels, a rabble of his companions,

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: thither provoked and instigated by his

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: distemper, and, forsooth, to search his house for

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: his wife’s love.

speaker: FORD
text: What, while you were there?

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: While I was there.

speaker: FORD
text: And did he search for you and could

speaker: FORD
text: not find you?

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: You shall hear. As good luck would have it,

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: comes in one Mistress Page, gives intelligence of

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: Ford’s approach, and, in her invention and Ford’s

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: wife’s distraction, they conveyed me into a

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: buck-basket.

speaker: FORD
text: A buck-basket!

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: By the Lord, a buck-basket! Rammed me

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: in with foul shirts and smocks, socks, foul stockings,

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: greasy napkins, that, Master Brook, there

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: was the rankest compound of villainous smell that

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: ever offended nostril.

speaker: FORD
text: And how long lay you there?

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: Nay, you shall hear, Master Brook, what I

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: have suffered to bring this woman to evil for your

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: good. Being thus crammed in the basket, a couple

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: of Ford’s knaves, his hinds, were called forth by

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: their mistress to carry me in the name of foul

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: clothes to Datchet Lane. They took me on their

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: shoulders, met the jealous knave their master in

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: the door, who asked them once or twice what they

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: had in their basket. I quaked for fear lest the lunatic

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: knave would have searched it, but fate, ordaining

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: he should be a cuckold, held his hand.

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: Well, on went he for a search, and away went I for

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: foul clothes. But mark the sequel, Master Brook.

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: I suffered the pangs of three several deaths: first,

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: an intolerable fright to be detected with a jealous

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: rotten bellwether; next, to be compassed, like a

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: good bilbo, in the circumference of a peck, hilt to

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: point, heel to head; and then, to be stopped in, like

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: a strong distillation, with stinking clothes that fretted

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: in their own grease. Think of that, a man of my

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: kidney—think of that—that am as subject to heat

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: as butter; a man of continual dissolution and thaw.

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: It was a miracle to ’scape suffocation. And in

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: the height of this bath, when I was more than half-stewed

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: in grease, like a Dutch dish, to be thrown

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: into the Thames and cooled, glowing hot, in that

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: surge, like a horseshoe! Think of that—hissing

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: hot—think of that, Master Brook.

speaker: FORD
text: In good sadness, sir, I am sorry that

speaker: FORD
text: for my sake you have suffered all this. My suit,

speaker: FORD
text: then, is desperate. You’ll undertake her no more?

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: Master Brook, I will be thrown into Etna,

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: as I have been into Thames, ere I will leave her

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: thus. Her husband is this morning gone a-birding.

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: I have received from her another embassy of meeting.

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: ’Twixt eight and nine is the hour, Master

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: Brook.

speaker: FORD
text: ’Tis past eight already, sir.

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: Is it? I will then address me to my appointment.

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: Come to me at your convenient leisure,

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: and you shall know how I speed; and the conclusion

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: shall be crowned with your enjoying her.

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: Adieu. You shall have her, Master Brook. Master

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: Brook, you shall cuckold Ford.

speaker: FORD
text: Hum! Ha! Is this a vision? Is this a dream? Do I

speaker: FORD
text: sleep? Master Ford, awake! Awake, Master Ford!

speaker: FORD
text: There’s a hole made in your best coat, Master

speaker: FORD
text: Ford. This ’tis to be married; this ’tis to have linen

speaker: FORD
text: and buck-baskets! Well, I will proclaim myself

speaker: FORD
text: what I am. I will now take the lecher. He is at my

speaker: FORD
text: house. He cannot ’scape me. ’Tis impossible he

speaker: FORD
text: should. He cannot creep into a half-penny purse,

speaker: FORD
text: nor into a pepper-box. But lest the devil that

speaker: FORD
text: guides him should aid him, I will search impossible

speaker: FORD
text: places. Though what I am I cannot avoid, yet to

speaker: FORD
text: be what I would not shall not make me tame. If I

speaker: FORD
text: have horns to make one mad, let the proverb go

speaker: FORD
text: with me: I’ll be horn-mad.
